description: The OR_LOG_QUEST_AN_P table contains questionnaire answers for OR management systems surgeries.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the procedure answer associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure record for which there is an answer.

columns.name: PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: PANEL
columns.description: The panel number in which the questionnaire is found.
